Welcome back

Epic fail, this is cropped.  Should be 1280x720, the film was made with 2 different types of cameras so it has 2 different aspect ratios.  By cropping out the letterbox you also over-cropped other parts.
As you can see there is no "IMAX" in the title so no there is nothing cut out because this isent the imax edition.
